function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Risk of mechanical damage to the coating leading to loss of virus-inactivating properties","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research involving viral titers may pose a risk of accidental exposure and transmission of the virus.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of affordable housing and economic hardship leading to eviction and housing displacement","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate economic hardship and impacts of the virus on low-income and minority communities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Association between housing displacement and increased covid-19 infection and mortality rates","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Eviction leading to overcrowding and homelessness","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transiency and overcrowding facilitate covid-19 transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evictions and housing displacement leading to increased crowding in residential environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Residential crowding and increased contact driving the spread of infectious respiratory illnesses","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding increasing the spread of respiratory infectious diseases in homeless shelters and public facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of covid-19 transmission in transient housing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weakened immune system due to stress from eviction threat","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lower access to covid-19 testing post-eviction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Eviction leading to lower access to covid-19 testing and medical attention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased access to primary and specialty medical care due to eviction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Eviction amplifying the individual risk of covid-19 complications and mortality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor ventilation, pest infestations, and mold linked to respiratory conditions and poor health","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Eviction and housing instability associated with comorbidities and mental health conditions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High healthcare costs associated with eviction increasing the likelihood of future evictions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Traumatizing effect of eviction on children","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health risks associated with eviction","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Racial disparities in eviction risk during covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher eviction rates for black and non-white households","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Racial wealth gap and lack of emergency funds","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact of covid-19 on people of color","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal death rates for different racial and ethnic groups due to covid-19 disparities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to social distance in low-wage jobs and crowded living conditions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Repetitive exposure to racism leading to health deterioration and chronic conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Eviction filings spreading covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Property owners using eviction as rent support for tenants","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased covid-19 transmission due to lifting eviction moratoria","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Excess infections due to backlog of cases and economic duress","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to legal representation in eviction cases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of health care access and medical debt","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased housing precarity among low-income populations and people of color","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Eviction and housing displacement increases the spread of covid-19 among vulnerable populations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of housing stability increases the risk of covid-19 infection, transmission, illness, and death","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases due to reduced outdoor socialization and increased time spent indoors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate housing design and planning contributing to poor living conditions and increased disease wellbeing.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Migration from urban to rural areas due to lack of space in multi-family challenges","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survey revealing inadequate conditions in multi-family housing in podgorica","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack experiences","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
